alert.note: Alert for Boone; Kanawha; Lincoln; Northwest Fayette; Putnam (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 7:48PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kanawha, southwestern Putnam, northeastern Lincoln, northwestern Fayette and northeastern Boone Counties through 830 PM EST... At 748 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Charleston, or near Charleston, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Montgomery, Chesapeake, Marmet, Belle, Cedar Grove, East Bank, Glasgow, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Pratt, Pinch, Powellton, Tornado, Coal Fork and Burnwell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 105. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 51 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 65 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 58 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Kanawha; Lincoln; Northwest Fayette; Putnam
